title: Google > Failure > lol
content:
A nice thing, I know it from this forum: [url=http://www.agearena.de/forum/index.php?mode=viewthread&forum_id=4&thread=313]Click[/url]

1. Go to the German Google site: [url=http://www.google.de]www.google.de[/url]
2. Type "Failure" in it.
3. Hit "Auf gut Glck!".

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

As I see the thread "This place has turned into almost complete crap":
Okay, it's some random stuff, but IMHO funny. It's old, too, but I think, it isn't so popular outside German speaking countries, so give it a try. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

- We want "The Universe is Toast" ! - [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img]
